autoTangent.text:
Adjust tangent softness
Use the spin box to change the amount of levelling of the tangent.\n\nUse the mouse wheel to change the amount in the spin box.
Control + mw : reduces the adjustment
Shift + mw : increases the adjustment
Alt + mw: to reset

Right click to open option window to save the default values
autoTangent.title: AutoTangent

offsetKeyLeft.text:
Offset the key timing to the left. Select controls in the order you wish to adjust the timing.
Use the spin box to change the amount of offset.

Use the mouse wheel to change the offset amount in the spin box.
Control + mw : reduces the adjustment
Shift + mw : increases the adjustment
Alt + mw: to reset
offsetKeyLeft.title: Offset keys left

offsetKeyRight.text:
Offset the key timing to the right. Select controls in the order you wish to adjust the timing.
Use the spin box to change the amount of offset.

Use the mouse wheel to change the offset amount in the spin box.
Control + mw : reduces the adjustment
Shift + mw : increases the adjustment
Alt + mw: to reset
offsetKeyRight.title: Offset keys Right

nudgeKeyLeft.text:
Shift selected keys to the left by the value in the float field. 
Use the spin box to change the amount of offset.\n\nUse the mouse wheel to change the offset amount in the spin box.
Control + mw : reduces the adjustment
Shift + mw : increases the adjustment
Alt + mw: to reset
nudgeKeyLeft.title: Nudge keys Left

nudgeKeyRight.text:
Shift selected keys to the right by the value in the float field. 
Use the spin box to change the amount of offset.\n\nUse the mouse wheel to change the offset amount in the spin box.
Control + mw : reduces the adjustment
Shift + mw : increases the adjustment
Alt + mw: to reset
nudgeKeyRight.title: Nudge keys Right

plotKey.text: Uses the neighbouring tangents to try and place this key to match them.
plotKey.title: Guess Key Value from Tangents

flipKeysStart.text: Flip curves based on the first selected key value.
flipKeysStart.title: Flip Keys First

flipKeysEnd.text: Flip curves based on the last selected key value.
flipKeysEnd.title: Flip Keys Last
